Articles.Description: A 15-year-old movie that was nominated for a major Oscar lands in the domestic box office Top 5 during its re-release, passing a major milestone.
Articles.Content:
Summary
  • The 15th anniversary re-release of Coraline earned $11.3 million in theaters this weekend.
  • This pushed its cumulative domestic total past the $80 million milestone.
